mapper.sql: user_id, username, password, nick_name, mail, phone, available, avatar_path, ctime, mtime, last_login_time
mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.username, u.password, u.nick_name, u.mail, u.phone, u.available, u.avatar_path, u.ctime, u.mtime, u.last_login_time from neat_user u where u.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into neat_user (username, password, nick_name, mail, phone, available, avatar_path, ctime, mtime, last_login_time) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{nickName}, #{mail}, #{phone}, #{available}, #{roleId}, #{avatarPath}, #{deptId}, #{ctime}, #{mtime}, #{lastLoginTime})
